name: AttachTrailerToVehicle
warnings: This will only work if both vehicles are streamed in for a player (check IsVehicleStreamedIn).
description: Attach a vehicle to another vehicle as a trailer.

params_body.name: trailerid
params_body.description: The ID of the vehicle that will be pulled.

params_body.name: vehicleid
params_body.description: The ID of the vehicle that will pull the trailer.

return_values: This function always returns 1, even if neither of the vehicle IDs passed are valid.
related_fn:
DetachTrailerFromVehicle: Detach a trailer from a vehicle.
 IsTrailerAttachedToVehicle: Check if a trailer is attached to a vehicle.
 GetVehicleTrailer: Check what trailer a vehicle is pulling.
